banner.title: Women Empowerment
banner.description: Empowering Women to Lead, Innovate, and Succeed.

mainContent.description: We are committed to advancing women’s empowerment and gender inclusion across Gujranwala’s industrial and entrepreneurial landscape. By fostering an enabling environment for women entrepreneurs, professionals, and students, the Alliance ensures that women play an active role in shaping the region’s economic future. Through strategic collaborations with women’s chambers of commerce, educational institutions, and development organisations, GBA has created meaningful opportunities for female participation in trade, entrepreneurship, and leadership. Women are actively engaged in GBA’s major initiatives - including international exhibitions, growth windows, and industry–academia programs - gaining exposure to global markets and business networks. Building on this commitment, GBA and its partners are spearheading the establishment of Gujranwala’s first Women Chamber of Commerce & Industry, a landmark initiative that will serve as the cornerstone of women-led business growth, innovation, and international connectivity in the region.

shortServices.title: Expanding Women’s Participation
shortServices.description: Creating pathways for women to engage in trade, entrepreneurship, and industry

shortServices.title: Leadership & Skill Development
shortServices.description: Building the capabilities women need to thrive as innovators and decision-makers

shortServices.title: Global Exposure & Opportunities
shortServices.description: Connecting women to international markets, networks, and collaborative platforms

shortServices.title: Building Institutional Support
shortServices.description: Establishing the region’s first Women Chamber to champion women-led growth
